CreateMember.name: CreateMember
CreateMember.description: Grants permission to create a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

CreateNetwork.name: CreateNetwork
CreateNetwork.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

CreateNode.name: CreateNode
CreateNode.description:
Grants permission to create a node within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain
                                                network

CreateProposal.name: CreateProposal
CreateProposal.description:
Grants permission to create a proposal that other blockchain network members can vote
                                                on to add or remove a member in an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

DeleteMember.name: DeleteMember
DeleteMember.description:
Grants permission to delete a member and all associated resources from an Amazon Managed
                                                Blockchain network

DeleteNode.name: DeleteNode
DeleteNode.description: Grants permission to delete a node from a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

GetMember.name: GetMember
GetMember.description:
Grants permission to return detailed information about a member of an Amazon Managed
                                                Blockchain network

GetNetwork.name: GetNetwork
GetNetwork.description:
Grants permission to return detailed information about an Amazon Managed Blockchain
                                                network

GetNode.name: GetNode
GetNode.description:
Grants permission to return detailed information about a node within a member of an
                                                Amazon Managed Blockchain network

GetProposal.name: GetProposal
GetProposal.description:
Grants permission to return detailed information about a proposal of an Amazon Managed
                                                Blockchain network

ListInvitations.name: ListInvitations
ListInvitations.description:
Grants permission to list the invitations extended to the active AWS account from
                                                any Managed Blockchain network

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description:
Grants permission to list the members of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network and
                                                the properties of their memberships

ListNetworks.name: ListNetworks
ListNetworks.description:
Grants permission to list the Amazon Managed Blockchain networks in which the current
                                                AWS account participates

ListNodes.name: ListNodes
ListNodes.description:
Grants permission to list the nodes within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain
                                                network

ListProposalVotes.name: ListProposalVotes
ListProposalVotes.description:
Grants permission to list all votes for a proposal, including the value of the vote
                                                and the unique identifier of the member that cast the vote for the given Amazon Managed
                                                Blockchain network

ListProposals.name: ListProposals
ListProposals.description: Grants permission to list proposals for the given Amazon Managed Blockchain network

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to view tags associated with an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

RejectInvitation.name: RejectInvitation
RejectInvitation.description: Grants permission to reject the invitation to join the blockchain network

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

UpdateMember.name: UpdateMember
UpdateMember.description: Grants permission to update a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

UpdateNode.name: UpdateNode
UpdateNode.description: Grants permission to update a node from a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

VoteOnProposal.name: VoteOnProposal
VoteOnProposal.description:
Grants permission to cast a vote for a proposal on behalf of the blockchain network
                                                member specified
